channel.title: How can I fix this?
channel.description: I portforwarded and I checked more than once to see if I did it properly, and I changed the ip client sided and server sided to my no-ip and I still can't connect to my server. Please help. I have teamviewer.

item.title: How can I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @megahost megahost
item.description:
@megahost wrote:

Change the ip server side to 0.0.0.0 and keep your client side your ip server side should stay at localhost

If it doesn’t work try searching for
127.0.0.1
0.0.0.0
Localhost
No-ip

Make sure all ips are yours but server side 0.0.0.0 or type in localhost for the ip

Read full topic

item.title: How can I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @josh225 josh225
item.description:
@josh225 wrote:

change your client so your still connecting to 127.0.0.1, you dont need to connect through any ports if your hosting it

Read full topic
